SELECT comp.`company_name`,proj.`project_name`,proj.`id`,proj.`is_completion` FROM `t_company` comp LEFT JOIN `t_project` proj ON proj.`company_id` = comp.`id` AND proj.`status` = 1 LEFT JOIN `t_order` o ON o.`project_id` = proj.`id` AND o.`status` = 1 LEFT JOIN `t_settlement` sett ON sett.`order_id` = o.`order_code` AND sett.`status` = 1 LEFT JOIN `t_payment` pay ON pay.`settlement_id` = sett.`id` AND pay.`status` = 1 WHERE comp.`status` = 1 AND
proj.`is_completion` = #{completion} AND
comp.`id` = #{companyId} AND
(o.`delivery_status` = 0 OR sett.`bill_delivery_status` = 2 OR sett.`buyer_settlement_status` = 2 OR sett.`settlement_delivery_status` = 2 OR sett.`supplier_settlement_status` = 2 OR pay.`approval_status` = 2 OR pay.`bill_open_time` = 2 OR pay.`payment_status` = 2 ) GROUP BY comp.`company_name`,proj.`project_name`,proj.`id`,proj.`is_completion`
limit #{pageStart,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
